alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 7:31PM CDT until June 04 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Washington County in east Tennessee... East central Cocke County in east Tennessee... Greene County in east Tennessee... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 831 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greeneville, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greeneville, Tusculum, Mosheim, Caney Branch, Chucky, Cedar Creek, Limestone, Camp Creek, Davy Crockett Birthplace and Mohawk. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 20 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
